data.quoute: There is always something ridiculous about the emotions of people whom one has ceased to love.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quoute: But love's a malady without a cure.
data.author: John Dryden

data.quoute: In love the paradox occurs that two beings become one and yet remain two.
data.author: Erich Fromm

data.quoute: Love is all we have, the only way that each can help the other.
data.author: Euripides

data.quoute: I don't know how to write love letters.
data.author: Frida Kahlo

data.quoute: There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand imitations.
data.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

data.quoute: The things that will destroy America are prosperity-at-any-price, peace-at-any-price, safety-first instead of duty-first, the love of soft living, and the get-rich-quick theory of life.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quoute: People have to really suffer before they can risk doing what they love.
data.author: Chuck Palahniuk

data.quoute: Man's nature is not essentially evil. Brute nature has been known to yield to the influence of love. You must never despair of human nature.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quoute: Before I had my child, I thought I knew all the boundaries of myself, that I understood the limits of my heart. It's extraordinary to have all those limits thrown out, to realize your love is inexhaustible.
data.author: Uma Thurman

data.quoute: You may not be able to change a situation, but with humor you can change your attitude about it.
data.author: Allen Klein

data.quoute: Watch your manner of speech if you wish to develop a peaceful state of mind. Start each day by affirming peaceful, contented and happy attitudes and your days will tend to be pleasant and successful.
data.author: Norman Vincent Peale

data.quoute: Bob Altman had this relaxed but serious attitude. Everybody loved him. I wanted him to adopt me.
data.author: Steve Buscemi

data.quoute: I like to help kids, work with kids in detention homes. Don't tell a kid what's right and wrong. He knows what's right and wrong. Find out what his attitude and his aptitude are; try to help him where he wants to go.
data.author: Evel Knievel

data.quoute: It's not in what you wear but how you handle yourself. Like Hollywood celebrity Lindsay Lohan, I used to like her a lot because of her great fashion style but look at her attitude. Fashion is also about knowing what's right and doing what is right.
data.author: Heart Evangelista

data.quoute: I've always felt like I've had the ability to choose which roles I was going to play. I don't think that the industry agreed with me, but I've always had a bit of a headstrong attitude of only doing the things that I really believe in and want to explore.
data.author: Brie Larson

data.quoute: I've never run into a guy who could win at the top level in anything today and didn't have the right attitude, didn't give it everything he had, at least while he was doing it; wasn't prepared and didn't have the whole program worked out.
data.author: Ted Turner

data.quoute: I was lucky that I had friends who have maintained a very regular attitude with me and haven't changed how they interact with me.
data.author: Will Poulter

data.quoute: A fit body gives you confidence. And there's nothing more impressive than a great attitude, which you can wear on your sleeve. But you'll have to remember the difference between being rude and being confident.
data.author: Virat Kohli

data.quoute: I can remember that on the shelves at home, there were these books by Thomas Wolfe. 'Look Homeward Angel' and 'Of Time and the River.' 'Of Time and the River' had just come out when I was aware of his name. My parents had a hard time convincing me that he was no kin whatsoever. My attitude was, 'Well, what's he doing on the shelf, then?'
data.author: Tom Wolfe

data.quoute: I believe firmly in God's control in life.
data.author: Charles R. Swindoll

data.quoute: We are involved in a life that passes understanding and our highest business is our daily life.
data.author: John Cage

data.quoute: Get correct views of life, and learn to see the world in its true light. It will enable you to live pleasantly, to do good, and, when summoned away, to leave without regret.
data.author: Robert E. Lee

data.quoute: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quoute: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
data.author: Audrey Hepburn

data.quoute: What is important in life is life, and not the result of life.
data.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

data.quoute: I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catcher's mitt on both hands; you need to be able to throw something back.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quoute: My life is every moment of my life. It is not a culmination of the past.
data.author: Hugh Leonard

data.quoute: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
data.author: William Wordsworth

data.quoute: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.
data.author: Earl Nightingale

data.quoute: There is always something ridiculous about the emotions of people whom one has ceased to love.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quoute: But love's a malady without a cure.
data.author: John Dryden

data.quoute: In love the paradox occurs that two beings become one and yet remain two.
data.author: Erich Fromm

data.quoute: Love is all we have, the only way that each can help the other.
data.author: Euripides

data.quoute: I don't know how to write love letters.
data.author: Frida Kahlo

data.quoute: There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand imitations.
data.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

data.quoute: The things that will destroy America are prosperity-at-any-price, peace-at-any-price, safety-first instead of duty-first, the love of soft living, and the get-rich-quick theory of life.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quoute: People have to really suffer before they can risk doing what they love.
data.author: Chuck Palahniuk

data.quoute: Man's nature is not essentially evil. Brute nature has been known to yield to the influence of love. You must never despair of human nature.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quoute: Before I had my child, I thought I knew all the boundaries of myself, that I understood the limits of my heart. It's extraordinary to have all those limits thrown out, to realize your love is inexhaustible.
data.author: Uma Thurman

data.quoute: It always seems impossible until it's done.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quoute: If you don't ask, you don't get.
data.author: Stevie Wonder

data.quoute: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.
data.author: Jessica Savitch

data.quoute: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quoute: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quoute: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
data.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

data.quoute: Well done is better than well said.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quoute: If you can dream it, you can do it.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quoute: It always seems impossible until it's done.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quoute: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
data.author: Charles R. Swindoll

data.quoute: When they are alone they want to be with others, and when they are with others they want to be alone. After all, human beings are like that.
data.author: Gertrude Stein

data.quoute: I need your help. I am injured, near death, and too weak to hike out of here. I am all alone. This is no joke. In the name of God, please remain to save me. I am out collecting berries close by and shall return this evening. Thank you, Chris McCandless.
data.author: Christopher McCandless

data.quoute: Look, if I were alone in the world, I would have the right to choose despair, solitude and self-fulfillment. But I am not alone.
data.author: Elie Wiesel

data.quoute: He who studies books alone will know how things ought to be, and he who studies men will know how they are.
data.author: Charles Caleb Colton

data.quoute: We are all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life.
data.author: Tennessee Williams

data.quoute: Nobody controls me. I travel with my husband when I can, when I know that I can go, and I know that my son is okay alone for a few days with the help.
data.author: Melania Trump

data.quoute: Marriage is good for those who are afraid to sleep alone at night.
data.author: St. Jerome

data.quoute: Obama provides hope. Whether he does anything, the hope that he provides for a nation and outside of America is enough. Just being who he is. You're the first black president. If he speaks on any issue or anything, he should be left alone.
data.author: Jay-Z

data.quoute: Every man is born as many men and dies as a single one.
data.author: Martin Heidegger

data.quoute: The two operations of our understanding, intuition and deduction, on which alone we have said we must rely in the acquisition of knowledge.
data.author: Rene Descartes
